Frequently Asked Questions

Is free consultation included?

Yes, we offer a free initial consultation for every package. You can contact us to discuss your project details and determine the most suitable solution for you.

What is the contract duration?

Our projects are generally one-time services and are completed within the specified delivery time. Flexible monthly subscriptions are available for maintenance and support services.

What are the payment options?

We offer bank transfer/EFT and credit card payment options. For larger projects, we can provide flexible payment plans.

What are the cancellation terms?

In case of cancellation after project commencement, billing will be based on the amount of work completed. Please refer to our contract for detailed information.
